title: Interface Engineering in Perovskite/Quantum Dot Hybrids for Enhanced Broadband Photovoltaics
description: This project proposes investigating the impact of engineered interfaces between wide-bandgap perovskite layers and narrow-bandgap colloidal quantum dots to achieve panchromatic light absorption and efficient charge transfer, aiming for higher efficiency and potentially improved stability in next-generation solar cells.
